events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I received last week because it does not fit as expected and I want to return it.
The customer's inquiry regarding returning a purchased jacket and requesting money back is categorized under Refund.
Support agent Lisa Johnson has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m Lisa from customer support. I understand you want to initiate a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirmation that the jacket is in its original condition for us to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 78934523. The jacket is unworn and still has the original tags attached, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the details. We have approved your refund request. Please send back the jacket using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will ship the jacket back today.
We confirm receipt of your returned jacket and have processed the refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected soon.
We are checking in to ensure your refund was received correctly and that you are satisfied with how your case was handled. Please let us know if you need anything else.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support and we hope to assist you again in the future should you need anything.
